date: "2020-03-31"
title: 'Playoff Projections'
subtitle: Based on 10,000 Monte Carlo simulations
---
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(readr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
d <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/playoffsims.csv"))
teamstats <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/teamstats.csv"))
d$Team <- paste0("[", d$Team, "](/teams/", gsub(" ", "", d$Team), ")") 
kable(d, align = "lcccccc") %>% add_header_above(c("2020 Playoffs" = 2, "Finish Likelihood" = 5)) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(3, border_left = T, bold = T)
```
